explains: n. 拖网渔船；拖网捕鱼的人

sentences.en: The trawler was fishing off the coast of Iceland.
sentences.cn: 拖网渔船在冰岛沿海捕鱼。

sentences.en: A big rescue operation has been launched for a trawler missing in the North Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 为了一艘在北大西洋失踪的拖网渔船，已经开始了一项大的营救行动。

sentences.en: Take the case of the Alaska Ranger, a 184-foot trawler that sank in the Bering Sea in 2008.
sentences.cn: 以阿拉斯加流浪者号为例，这艘长达56米的拖网渔船于2008年沉没在白令海。
